name: Ogie Alcasid
description: '''Herminio Jose Lualhati''' "'''Ogie'''" '''Alcasid Jr.''' (born August 27, 1967) is a Filipino actor, singer, songwriter, comedian, director and producer. He is best known for his songwriting and collaboration with other musical artists. He has appeared in films and television shows, notably as a cast member of ''[[Tropang Trumpo]]'' (1994–1995) and ''[[Bubble Gang]]'' (1995–2013; 2025–present) and a host and main performer of ''[[SOP (TV program)|SOP]]'' (1997–2010) and  ''[[ASAP (TV program)|ASAP]]'' (2017–present). He is currently married to [[Regine Velasquez]], with whom he has one child.
